item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network to meet with other small business owners who work in healthcare to discuss shared challenges.

This is an event for small business people & entrepreneurs and those interested in making their way into being one.

Most healthcare IT managers believe mobile technology will have big impact on patient care, according to the latest Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society survey.

Nearly half of the health IT professionals queried believe mobile technology will "substantially impact healthcare delivery" in the years ahead, while 16% of respondents said mobile technology will dramatically change the future of healthcare delivery, according to the survey. HIMSS looked to IT professionals from major U.S. hospitals and had approximately 180 participants who answered questions regarding mobile use in their organizations.

Let's learn from the experts who are advocating or building Mobile Technology solutions.

The cost is $10 per ticket. People who have purchased tickets a minimum of 24 hours prior to the event will receive preprinted name badges. Refreshments will be served.

Go to http://www.painpointsinhealthcare.com/ for tickets and more info.

Register here or click the yellow Register Now button to reserve your spot.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Small Business Challenges in the Healthcare Industry
